sentence.text: Individual 6 is a 10-year-old female with multiple congenital anomalies: choanal atresia requiring surgical repair, hydrocephalus with C0/C1 stenosis treated with ventriculocisternostomy, and cleft palate.
She was noted to have hypertelorism, low-set ears, and micrognathia.
At age 10.3 years, her head circumference is 55.5 cm (+2 SD), height is 134 cm (-0.6 SD), and weight is 31 kg (-0.31 SD).
Clinical exome sequencing identified a maternally inherited missense variant in POLR1A c.1442G>A; p.
